price: Ẹ má ṣe lo ìbúra yín fún ẹ̀tàn láààrin ara yín, nítorí kí ẹsẹ̀ yín má baà yẹ̀ gẹ̀rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn ìdúróṣinṣin rẹ̀, àti nítorí kí ẹ má baà tọ́ ìyà burúkú wò nípa bí ẹ ṣe ṣẹ́rí àwọn ènìyàn kúrò lójú ọ̀nà (ẹ̀sìn) Allāhu. Ìyà ńlá yó sì wà fún yín.
arabic: وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَكُمۡ دَخَلَۢا بَيۡنَكُمۡ فَتَزِلَّ قَدَمُۢ بَعۡدَ ثُبُوتِهَا وَتَذُوقُواْ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِمَا صَدَدتُّمۡ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَكُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
